mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_ID as "${columnPrefix}id", ${tableAlias}S_TEMPLATETYPECODE as "${columnPrefix}templateTypeCode", ${tableAlias}S_QUERYCODE as "${columnPrefix}queryCode", ${tableAlias}C_FLAG as "${columnPrefix}flag", ${tableAlias}S_REMARK as "${columnPrefix}remark", ${tableAlias}S_SORT as "${columnPrefix}sort", ${tableAlias}D_CREATETIME as "${columnPrefix}createTime", ${tableAlias}S_CREATEUSER as "${columnPrefix}createUser", ${tableAlias}S_CREATEUSERNAME as "${columnPrefix}createUserName", ${tableAlias}D_DELTIME as "${columnPrefix}delTime", ${tableAlias}S_DELUSERCODE as "${columnPrefix}delUserCode", ${tableAlias}S_DELUSERNAME as "${columnPrefix}delUserName"
